prod_short_desc: Create racing role-play stories with the colorful car!
prod_long_desc:
Little racing drivers will love to build and rebuild this My First Race Car set for endless driving fun. It’s simple for young children to build, developing fine motor and early construction skills, and it’s a fun preschool toy to take along and play with wherever you go! Turn the decorated driver brick to choose who drives the car! LEGO® DUPLO® bricks are specially designed to be fun and safe for small hands.
Features a buildable race car on a LEGO® DUPLO® wheelbase.
Also includes a double-sided brick featuring different driver characters as story starters.
A quick and simple build for hours of driving fun.
This set is a great toy to take and play with wherever you go.
Turn the double-sided brick to choose your racing driver.
This preschool toy makes and ideal gift for preschool children.
LEGO® DUPLO® products are specially designed to be fun and easy for small hands.
Suitable for ages 1½-3.
Race car measures over 2” high, 3” long and 2” wide.
